episodes.title: ORP - Eddie Trunk
episodes.summary:
Legendary Rock DJ and 'That Metal Show' host Eddie Trunk explains his disgust for how the Grammys treat Heavy Metal/Hard Rock and how they disrespected Metallica. 

Then we go back to when Jay Mohr was in-studio and Eddie Trunk was promoting his book 'Eddie Trunk's Hard Rock and Essential Heavy Metal V02'. It leads to a debated of Eddie's selections as well as Jay Mohr running out of the studio because he crapped his pants. 

Listen live, weekday afternoons, 3pm-6pm ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. Full episodes available OnDemand, download the SiriusXM app.

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/siriusxm-radio-music-talk/id317951436?mt=8

episodes.title: ORP - Mike Bochetti Superbowl Ads, Joe DeRosa/Buck Angel Saga
episodes.summary:
Comedian Mike Bochetti returns to the show, and we get Mike to do some green-screen ads for the  official sponsors of the Super Bowl.

Joe DeRosa calls in to promote his new Comedy special, we catch up with Joe and the subject of his issue with 'Buck Angel' gets brought up again.

Going back into the archives, Joe DeRosa talks about his love for Bailey Jay, but not into other transsexuals, especially when asked about 'Buck Angel'.

Ricky Gervais shows up in studio and we ask him would he prefer a trans woman with a penis or a trans male with a vagina.

Listen live, weekday afternoons, 3pm-6pm ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. Full episodes available OnDemand, download the SiriusXM app.

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/siriusxm-radio-music-talk/id317951436?mt=8

episodes.title: ORP - Charles Ebersole
episodes.summary:
Charles Ebersole calls in to talk about his new ESPN 30 for 30 documentary 'This Was The XFL'. Comedians Craig Gass, Sherrod Small, and the 'Mad Cuban' Carl Ruiz from the 'Food Network' are instudio.

After being hung up on, Charles joins us live in-studio to discuss just leaving the SuperBowl to come here. He goes further in-depth about the XFL documentary.

Listen live, weekday afternoons, 3pm-6pm ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. Full episodes available OnDemand, download the SiriusXM app.

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/siriusxm-radio-music-talk/id317951436?mt=8

episodes.title: ORP - Dan Nianan Saga
episodes.summary:
Comedian Craig Gass brings up this infatuation with comedian Dan Nianan and his alleged scamming of other comedians gigs. Then we get Dan on the phone to try to straighten this whole story out. 

Listen live, weekday afternoons, 3pm-6pm ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. Full episodes available OnDemand, download the SiriusXM app.

episodes.title: ORP - Vincent D'Onofrio Saga
episodes.summary:
A look back at the surprising recent controversy with actor Vincent D'Onofrio. While on another show, Vincent brought up the time he was on 'Opie & Anthony' during the reveal of the Andrew Weiner photos, claming the show video was edited in a way to make Vincent look bad. We discuss that, plus Opie & Vincent have a back-and-forth on twitter to resolve the situation. 

Listen live, weekday afternoons, 3pm-6pm ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. To hear full episodes OnDemand, download the SiriusXM app

episodes.title: Kevin Smith's 'Sucking Candy with Kevin & Andy' Show 02
episodes.summary:
Kevin Smith & Andy McElfresh normally host the popular podcast 'Edumaction' on the SModcast Network. Today, they are filling in for 'Opie & Jim Norton' on SiriusXM. 

Topics include: Dog's can understand what we say and how we say it, 'Geeking Out' co-host Greg Grunberg tells stories of his career, growing up with JJ Abrams, Slash, the Coen Brothers, a story about the film 'LadyKillers', Kevin geeking out on 'Late Show with Stephen Colbert', and more. 

Listen live, weekday mornings, 7am-10:30am ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. To hear full episodes of the Opie & Jim Norton, and for a free trial, go to http://www.siriusxm.com or download the SiriusXM app

episodes.title: Kevin Smith's 'Sucking Candy with Kevin & Andy' Show 01
episodes.summary:
Kevin Smith & Andy McElfresh normally host the popular podcast 'Edumaction' on the SModcast Network. Today, they are filling in for 'Opie & Jim Norton' on SiriusXM. 

Topics include: Kevin's mom's release from the hospital, Is 'The Exorcist' Father Karras' mother in hell, JJ Abrams, Star Wars, reindeers struck by lightning, an old inter-office memo about 'Back to the Future', is goofy a dog, the price of epipens, NJ transit man saves a man on the tracks, facts with Andy, and seriously, is Father Karras' mother in hell??

episodes.title: Doc Series Ep05 [11-09-2015]
episodes.summary: Join Gregg "Opie" Hughes and the Stangel Brothers as they discuss documentaries ranging from music, food, life experiences and more. Documentaries included; The Last Waltz, some rock docs, Vice's Suicide Forest, The Bridge, Kareem: Minority of One, and We Live in Public.

episodes.title: Doc Series Ep04 [10-05-2015] Ondi Timoner
episodes.summary: Join Gregg "Opie" Hughes and the Stangel Brothers as they discuss documentaries ranging from music, food, life experiences and more. Documentaries included; SuperMensch, All Things Must Pass, Atari: Game Over, Being Evel, and Brand: A Second Coming with Director Ondi Timoner.

episodes.title: Doc Series Ep03 [09-02-2015] Damon Gameau Laurie David
episodes.summary: Join Gregg "Opie" Hughes and the Stangel Brothers as they discuss documentaries ranging from music, food, life experiences and more. Documentaries include; That Sugar Film, Fed Up, 12 O'Clock Boys, Toe Tag Parole, and your suggestions. Call-ins from "That Sugar Film" Director Damon Gameau and Executive Producer of "Fed Up" Laurie David.

episodes.title: Doc Series Ep02 [08-05-2015]
episodes.summary: Join Gregg "Opie" Hughes and the Stangel Brothers as they discuss documentaries ranging from music, food, life experiences and more. Documentaries include; The Wolfpack, The Most Insane Amusement Park, Senna, Soaked in Bleach, and Call Me Lucky. We also take Caller Suggestions

episodes.title: Doc Series Ep01 [07-08-2015] Matthew Heineman Billy Corben
episodes.summary: Join Gregg "Opie" Hughes and the Stangel Brothers as they discuss documentaries ranging from music, food, life experiences and more. Director of "Cartel Land" Matthew Heineman calls-in to discuss his film. The guys talk about the Glen Campbell documentary, "I'll Be Me" and his battle with Alzheimer's. The upcoming Amy Winehouse documentary tells her struggles with drugs, celebrity, and relationship with her father. Billy Corben calls-in to talk the world of documentary film-making.

episodes.title: O&J - Andrew Dice Clay Anderson Cooper
episodes.summary:
Comedian and long time friend Andrew 'Dice' Clay returns to the show, to talk about his new Showtime.  

Then CNN reporter Anderson Cooper crosses over with Dice, then discusses his new documentary about his mom and the Vanderbuilt family. 

A discussion about a man with a bionic penis, and a look at genital warts.

Show: twitter.com/OpieandJimmy
Opie: twitter.com/Opieradio
Jim Norton: twitter.com/JimNorton

Listen live, weekday mornings, 7am-10:30am ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. To hear full episodes of the Opie & Jim Norton Show, and for a free trial, go to http://www.siriusxm.com or download the SiriusXM app

episodes.title: O&J - John Popper, Butt Bowling, Jim Breuer Fantasy Camp
episodes.summary:
Musician John Popper of 'Blues Traveler' comes by to talk about his new book, and the crazy stories of his life. 

We watch a video of a girl bowling with her butt hole.

Comedian Jim Breuer talks about being at the NY Mets fantasy camp.

episodes.title: O&J - Aaron Paul
episodes.summary:
Actor Aaron Paul returns to discuss his new show 'The Path', plus moving to LA, 'Making A Murderer', and more.

We talk about the advancement of robot technology will wind up being used for sex robots with comedians Tom Papa & Mark Normand.

Miles Davis tells stories about being friends with Chip Chipperson.

episodes.title: O&J - Dick Cavett
episodes.summary:
Legendary American talk show host, Dick Cavett, returns to the show with comedian Gilbert Gottfried sitting in. Discussing his latest book and plenty of interesting and sometime's seedy stories about celebrities of the past.

Then we go back to 2005, for Dick Cavett's 1st ever appearance on the old show.

episodes.title: O&J - Lita Ford Saga P01
episodes.summary:
Seg 01: Musician Lita Ford is in studio to talk about her new book and talks about the issues with her ex-husband and her children. Joined by comedians Bonnie McFarlane & Chris Distefano

Seg 02: Thoughts and feelings after the Lita Ford interview

Seg 03: Jim Gillette sends over emails, transcripts, and police reports involving Lita Ford. Joined by comedians Doug Benson & Theo Von.

Seg 04: Jim Gillete and sons call into the show to rebut Lita's claims and stories. Joined by comedians Doug Benson & Theo Von.

episodes.title: O&J - Amy Schumer Denies Joke Stealing
episodes.summary:
Show: twitter.com/OpieandJimmy
Opie: twitter.com/Opieradio
Jim Norton: twitter.com/JimNorton

Amy Schumer showed up on Jim Norton's 'Advice Show' on Wed [01-20-2016] to speak out against allegations of her stealing jokes. 

Part 01: We review highlights of Amy's statements from Jim's show with comedian Rich Vos. 

Part 02: Comedian Tammy Pescatelli calls in to apologize for her statements against Amy, and hopes to put it to rest and move on.

Part 03: We review more clips of Amy on Jim's show with Matt Oswalt and Rich Vos.

Listen live, weekday mornings, 7am-10:30am ET on Sirius 206 / XM 103. To hear full episodes of the Opie & Jim Norton Show, and for a free trial, go to http://www.siriusxm.com
